Blood of Heracles

Blood of Heracles (Speed)

Fear me, for the blood of the greatest hero in the known world courses through my veins!

"Blood of Heracles (Speed)" specialisation
+2.5% to this Hero's hitpoints

Disciplinarian

Disciplinarian (Replenishment)

Show them, in certain terms, the ignominy and shame of the defeated, and the inexorable right of the victorious.

+7% to casualty replenishment when raiding
+2.5% to this Hero's hitpoints

Disciplinarian (Campaign Movement & Attrition)

Show them, in certain terms, the ignominy and shame of the defeated, and the inexorable right of the victorious.

Raiding no longer incurs movement penalties
-15% to attrition in Hero's army
+2.5% to this Hero's hitpoints

-15% to attrition in Hero's army

The Collector

The Collector

I collect anything I find. I never throw anything away that's mine.

+30% to treasures looted after battle
+2.5% to this Hero's hitpoints

The Collector (Influence)

I collect anything I find. I never throw anything away that's mine.

+20 influence after victory, doubled if battle captives are killed
+2.5% to this Hero's hitpoints

The Collector (Captives)

I collect anything I find. I never throw anything away that's mine.

+20% to battle captives taken
+2.5% to this Hero's hitpoints

Formation Specialist

Formation Specialist

"Formation, formation, formation" is the mantra – when the many fight as one, victory is ever in sight.

+4% to missile resistance of all units in Hero's army
+15% to ammunition of missile units in Hero's army
+2.5% to this Hero's hitpoints

Formation Specialist (Attack Speed)

"Formation, formation, formation" is the mantra – when the many fight as one, victory is ever in sight.

+8% to missile resistance of missile units in Hero's army
+10% to reload skill of missile units
+2.5% to this Hero's hitpoints

Formation Specialist (Armour)

"Formation, formation, formation" is the mantra – when the many fight as one, victory is ever in sight.

+6% to missile resistance of shielded infantry units in Hero's army
+15% to armour-piercing damage of missile units in Hero's army

Master Ambusher

Master Ambusher (Morale & Happiness)

Sticks and stones, blood and bones, surely, but also hearts and minds, to counter surprise and defeat natural advantage.

Reduces happiness in the local enemy province by -5
+8% to morale of all units when defending
+2.5% to this Hero's hitpoints

Master Ambusher (Melee & Charge)

Sticks and stones, blood and bones, surely, but also hearts and minds, to counter surprise and defeat natural advantage.

Increases the charge of units by +15% when ambushing
Increases the melee attack of units by +10% when ambushing
+2.5% to this Hero's hitpoints

Master Ambusher

Sticks and stones, blood and bones, surely, but also hearts and minds, to counter surprise and defeat natural advantage.

+20% to success chance of ambushes
+15% to chance of Hero evading ambushes

Despoiler

Despoiler

Take only what you need, but do not leave what's left for the foe when you can destroy it instead; denial of victory is the same as defeat.

+15% to income from sacking
+30% to income from razing
+2.5% to this Hero's hitpoints

Take only what you need, but do not leave what's left for the foe when you can destroy it instead; denial of victory is the same as defeat.

+15% to casualty replenishment when sacking
+2.5% to this Hero's hitpoints

Despoiler (Damage & Influence)

Take only what you need, but do not leave what's left for the foe when you can destroy it instead; denial of victory is the same as defeat.

+25% to income from sacking
Causes greater damage to buildings when sacking
+15 to influence after razing a settlement for 5 turns (when character is in a non-razed region)
+2.5% to this Hero's hitpoints

Veil of Nyx

Light Skirmisher Chariot

Light Skirmisher Chariot

Though the war is not his own, but born of loyalty alone, this does not prevent the Lycian king from giving his all – quite the opposite in fact. This chariot enables him to effectively skirmish with the foe.

Grants a chariot ancillary to the Hero
+2.5% to this Hero's hitpoints

Skirmisher Chariot

Grants a chariot ancillary to the Hero
+2.5% to this Hero's hitpoints

Reinforced Melee Chariot

Though the war is not his own, but born of loyalty alone, this does not prevent the Lycian king from giving his all – quite the opposite in fact. This deadly spiked-wheeled chariot brings him to the centre of the action.

Grants a chariot ancillary to the Hero
+2.5% to this Hero's hitpoints
